previous.excerpt: Overview We believe that the bicycle is the future of urban mobility, and that having better bike parkings is a great way of promoting theâ€¦

frontmatter.title: bike de boa
frontmatter.description: A collaborative map of places to park your bike safely, encouraging you to bike more. With the web app you can search for bike parkings nearby and map new ones while learning about urban mobility and what makes for good bike parking and safer streets.
frontmatter.minibio: Web app for collaboratively mapping safe places in the city to park your bike.
